CustomField.description: Whether a user can update a limited set of field (see white list fields) when a record has been submitted but before it has been approved. This is useful in cases where managers need to approve records but shouldn't have entry permission for resources.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Whether a user can update a limited set of field (see white list fields) when a record has been submitted but before it has been approved. This is useful in cases where managers need to approve records but shouldn't have entry permission for resources.
CustomField.label: Allow Limited Exp Report Edit Post Submt
